title: Tickets Panel Height
content: Set the maximum height for the tickets panel in the chat.
title: Panel height
content: Set the maximum height of the tickets panel.

title: Height Offset
content: Subtract the offset value from the ticket panel height.
title: Offset
content: Subtract the offset value from the height value.

title: Display Articles
content: Show the articles section in the right panel of the ticket area.
title: Articles
content: Display the articles section in the right area.

title: Hide Tickets in Chat
content: Hide tickets from the chat widget and remove them from the ticket area.
title: Do not show tickets in chat
content: Hide tickets from the chat widget and chats from the ticket area.

title: Hide Archived Tickets
content: Hide archived tickets from users in the system.
title: Hide archived tickets
content: Hide archived tickets from users.

title: Show User Name as Title
content: Display the full name of the user as the conversation title instead of a generic title.
title: User name as title
content: Display the user full name in the left panel instead of the conversation title.

title: Default Conversation Name
content: Set a default name for conversations that don't have a title.
title: Default conversation name
content: Set the default name to use for conversations without a name.

title: Customize Ticket Field Names
content: Modify the default field names in the ticket system.
title: Ticket field names
content: Change the default field names.

title: Registration Required
content: Require user registration or login before accessing the ticket area.
title: Require registration
content: Require the user registration or login in order to use the tickets area.

title: Disable Password Field
content: Disable the password field on the registration form to simplify the login process.
title: Disable password
content: Disable the login and remove the password field from the registration form.

title: Registration Redirect URL
content: Specify a URL to redirect users to if registration is required and they aren't logged in.
title: Registration redirect
content: Redirect the user to the specified URL if the registration is required and the user is not logged in. Leave blank to use the default registration form.

title: Default Registration Form
content: Choose the default form (Login or Registration) to display when registration is required.
title: Default form
content: Set the default form to display if the registraion is required.

title: User Panel Ticket Form Fields
content: Select which fields to include in the new ticket creation form on user panel.
title: Ticket fields
content: Choose which fields to include in the new ticket form.

title: Custom Ticket Fields
content: Add custom fields to the new ticket creation form for additional information.
title: Ticket custom fields
content: Add custom fields to the new ticket form.

title: Ticket Status Management
content: Create and manage various ticket statuses for use across the system.

title: Disable Features in Tickets
content: Choose which features to disable in the ticket area.
title: Disable features
content: Choose which fields to disable from the tickets area.

title: Default Department
content: Set the default department for all new tickets. Enter the department ID.
title: Default department
content: Set the default departments for all tickets. Enter the department ID.

title: Welcome Message for New Tickets
content: Send a custom message to users when they create their first ticket. Text formatting and merge fields are supported.
title: Welcome message
content: Send a message to new users when they create the first ticket. Text formatting and merge fields are supported.

title: New Ticket Email Notification
content: Send an email notification to users when a new conversation (ticket) is created.
title: New conversation notification
content: Send an email to the user when a new conversation is created.

title: New Ticket Email Template
content: Customize the email template sent to the user when a new ticket is created. Use text, HTML, and merge fields like {conversation_url_parameter}, {user_name}, {message}, {attachments}, and {conversation_id}.
title: New conversation email
content: Template for the email sent to the user when a new conversation is created. You can use text, HTML, and the following merge fields: {conversation_url_parameter}, {user_name}, {message}, {attachments}, {conversation_id}.

title: Send Message with Enter Key
content: Allow users to send messages in the ticket area by pressing the ENTER keyboard button.
title: Send message via enter button
content: Send the message via the ENTER keyboard button.

title: Enable reCaptcha
content: Protect the ticket area from spam and abuse by enabling Google reCAPTCHA.
title: reCaptcha
content: Protect the tickets area from spam and abuse with Google reCAPTCHA.

title: Manual Ticket Initialization
content: Disable auto-initialization of the tickets area. Requires custom JavaScript to initialize the ticket area. If this setting is enabled and the area doesn't appear, disable it.
title: Manual initialization
content: Disable auto-initialization of the tickets area. When this setting is active you must initialize the tickets area with a custom JavaScript API code written by you. If the tickets area doesn't appear and this setting is enabled, disable it.
